alert.note: Alert for Butte; Meade (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 09 at 4:15PM MDT until June 09 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL BUTTE AND WEST CENTRAL MEADE COUNTIES... At 414 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles northeast of Nisland, or 17 miles east of Belle Fourche, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. A trained spotter reported 50 to 60 mph gusts and penny sized hail in Newell. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Newell, Nisland, Vale and Bear Butte State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
